title: Arw SkT T1 skins going to come out again
body: i really want SKT T1 zed because it's the best of all the zed skins but will it ever come out again?{{champion:238}}

replies.body:
It will almost certainly come out again later this year when Worlds are on.

Although if you want it, you might have to be prepared to buy it in a bundle. Sometimes they release them separately, sometimes not.

Ill admit, it is pretty cool to see the champions in tracksuits and other 'people' clothes. instead of their normal battle armour etc. It makes them feel very real.  While the 2017 SKT skins are great, they kind of miss this mark imo.
